data.title: Online Degrees for Adult Students
data.meta_description: The College of Adult and Graduate Studies at CCU offers online degrees for adults including Associate, Bachelorâs, Masterâs, and Doctoral Degrees. Apply today!
data.text:
Flexible. Convenient. Online.

Higher education offered to online learners features a number of benefits that can help you pursue your passion and find the work experience and life experience you have always wanted. Through modern technology, you can take online courses from nearly anywhere, and online instruction offers you the flexibility that caters to the working adult. It also allows you to complete your online learning around family and career commitments.

CCU Online offers more than 100 degree program options to students and adult learners throughout the United States and even to distance learners abroad. Thousands of online students have earned degrees in associate, bachelor, and graduate programs without ever setting foot on campus.

Most courses are taught in five-week blocks and offered as 100% online classes, so you can take one at a time and make online school work around your schedule. All classes are taught from a Christian worldview.

Are You a Transfer Student?

If you have taken courses at another accredited college or university, you may be surprised to learn how quickly and seamlessly you can transfer college credits to earn your degree through CCU's College of Adult and Graduate Studies.

Explore Online Degree Programs
